name: Craigslist dark theme
description: This is a dark-themed, subdued style for Craigslist. It maintains much of Craigslist's simplistic design, however modernizes the aesthetics of it.

user.name: frydaddy
user.about: I am a CS/IT major with a focus on SE. I enjoy web development and have recently began writing styles and scripts in my free time.

additional_info:
Version 1.3

By default, this theme is mostly chromatic, however you may pick different colors for various parts of the site. Colors I have found go well with it are:

Dark olive: #3A4006
subdued blue: #1B344D
bleached red: #4D1C24
